author: misilva73
content: I think it is measured after adding to the DB. Can you confirm <@402853454126776320>?

author: garyrong
content: Sorry for the late reply, yes we have. <@606464909907197983> implements the dedicated state size tracer.

author: garyrong
content: Yes, we also count the database overhead, such as key prefix and so on. BUt the overhead is very limited

author: garyrong
content: I think han measures the size of state in the compact format. For example, for EOAs, we omit the storage root and code hash by saving 64 bytes. It's what we do in our storage level.

author: garyrong
content: Also, we consider the contract code de-duplication
